Verses: 1 dhaaveedhin Kumaaranaagiya Saalomon Than Raajyaththile Balappattaan; Avanudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Avanudane Irundhu Avanai Migavum Periyavanaakkinaar.
2 saalomon Aayiramperukku Adhipadhigalum, Nooruperukku Adhipadhigalum, Nyaayaadhipadhigalum, Isravel Engumirukkira Vamsangalin Thalaivaraagiya Sagala Prabukkalumaana Isravel Anaivarodum Pesi,
3 avanum Avanodekooda Sabaiyaaranaivarum, Kibiyonilirukkira Medaikkup Ponaargal.

4 dhaaveedhu Dhevanudaiya Pettikku Erusalemile Koodaarampottu Aayaththampannina Sthalaththirkuk Keeriyaadhyaareemilirundhu Adhaik Konduvandhaan; Karththarindhaasanaagiya Mose Vanaandharaththile Pannina Dhevanudaiya Aasarippuk Koodaaram Ange Irundhadhu.
5 oorin Puththiranaagiya Ooriyin Kumaaran Pesaleyel Undupannina Vengalap Palipeedamum Ange Karththarin Vaasasthalaththirku Munbaaga Irundhadhu; Saalomonum Sabaiyaarum Adhai Naadipponaargal.
6 ange Saalomon Aasarippuk Koodaaraththirku Munbaagak Karththarin Sannidhiyilirukkira Vengalap Palipeedaththinmel Aayiram Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalaichcheluththip Paliyittaan.
7 andru Raaththiriyile Dhevan Saalomonukku Dharisanamaagi: Nee Virumbugiradhai Ennidaththil Kel Endraar.
8 saalomon Dhevanai Nokki: Dhevareer En Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhukkupperiya Kirubai Seydhu, Ennai Avan Sthaanaththile Raajaavaakkineer.

9 ippodhum Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Neer En Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhukku Arulina Umadhu Vaakkuththaththam Urudhippaduvadhaaga; Dhevareer Boomiyin Thoolaththanai Eraalamaana Janaththinmel Ennai Raajaavaakkineer.

10 ippodhum Naan Indha Janaththirku Munbaagap Pokkum Varaththumaayirukkaththakka Gnaanaththaiyum Arivaiyum Enakkuth Thandharulum; Eraalamaayirukkira Indha Ummudaiya Janaththai Nyaayam Visaarikkaththakkavan Yaar Endraan.

11 appozhudhu Dhevan Saalomonai Nokki: Indha Viruppam Un Irudhayaththil Irundhapadiyaalum, Nee Aisuvariyaththaiyum Sambaththaiyum Ganaththaiyum, Un Pagaignarin Praananaiyum, Neediththa Aayusaiyum Kelaamal, Naan Unnai Arasaalappannina En Janaththai Nyaayam Visaarikkaththakka Gnaanaththaiyum Vivegaththaiyum Nee Kettapadiyinaalum,

12 gnaanamum Vivegamum Thandhirukkiradhumallaamal, Unakkumun Irundha Raajaakkalukkaagilum Unakkuppin Irukkum Raajaakkalukkaagilum Illaadha Aisuvariyaththaiyum Sambaththaiyum Ganaththaiyum Unakkuth Tharuven Endraar.
13 ippadi Saalomon Kibiyonilirukkira Mettirkup Poi Aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Sannidhiyilirundhu Erusalemukku Vandhu, Isravelai Arasaandaan.

14 saalomon Radhangalaiyum Kudhiraiveeraraiyum Serththaan; Avanukku Aayiraththu Naanooru Radhangal Irundhadhu; Panneeraayiram Kudhiraiveerarum Irundhaargal; Avaigalai Radhangalin Pattanangalilum, Avargalai Raajaavaagiya Thannidaththil Erusalemilum Vaiththirundhaan
15 raajaa Erusalemile Velliyaiyum Ponnaiyum Karkalpolavum, Kedhurumarangalaip Pallaththaakkil Irukkira Kaattaththimarangal Polavum Adhigamaakkinaan.
16 saalomonukku Irundha Kudhiraigalum Pudavaigalum Egipthilirundhukonduvarappattadhu; Raajaavin Varththagar Pudavaigalai Oppandha Vilaikkirayaththukku Vaanginaargal.

17 avargal Egipthilirundhu Oru Radhaththai Arunooru Vellikkaasukkum, Oru Kudhiraiyai Nootraimbadhu Vellikkaasukkum Konduvaruvaargal; Andhappadiye Eththiyarin Sagala Raajaakkalukkum, Seeriyaavin Raajaakkalukkum Avargal Moolamaaik Konduvarappattadhu.
